queries.description: Reading from uninitialized indeterminate values may produce undefined behavior.
queries.name: The value of an object must not be read before it has been set

RULE-11-6-2.title: The value of an object must not be read before it has been set

queries.description: An assignment operator shall not assign the address of an object with automatic storage duration to an object with a greater lifetime

RULE-6-8-3.title: An assignment operator shall not assign the address of an object with automatic storage duration to an object with a greater lifetime
